## Verification Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic
- [ ] No unused imports or variables
- [ ] Code is readable and maintainable

### Testing
- [ ] Changes tested locally
- [ ] `flutter analyze` passes
- [ ] `flutter format` applied
- [ ] No new warnings introduced
- [ ] Test cases added (if applicable)

### Documentation
- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] Inline comments added for clarity
- [ ] API documentation updated (if applicable)

### Security
- [ ] No sensitive information added (API keys, credentials)
- [ ] No breaking security changes
- [ ] Dependencies checked for vulnerabilities

### Platform Compatibility
- [ ] Tested on Android (if applicable)
- [ ] Tested on iOS (if applicable)
- [ ] Tested on Web (if applicable)
